title: NO MORE ZERO DAYS - Motivational Speech (This Will Change Your Life!)
itunes:title: NO MORE ZERO DAYS - Motivational Speech (This Will Change Your Life!)
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
"I just don't care about myself." If this is you, then this speech is for you!


"Rule #1: There are no more zero days. A zero day is when you don't do a single solitary thing towards whatever your dream or goal is in this life. You need to make a decision that there are no more zero days."


This video was inspired by r/ryans01's now legendary post on Reddit. Special thanks to him for giving us permission.


Speaker:


Marcus “Elevation” Taylor: http://bit.ly/38FUFoS


Music:


Really Slow Motion

Secession Studios


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
